remarks: The substitution of some variables for expressions in a raw expression.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubffval.c $e |- C = ( mCN ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubffval.g $e |- G = ( freeMnd ` ( C u. V ) ) $.
mrsubfval $p |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V ) -> ( S ` F ) = ( e e. R |-> ( G gsum ( ( v e. ( C u. V ) |-> if ( v e. A , ( F ` v ) , <" v "> ) ) o. e ) ) ) ) $.
$d A e v $.
$d C e v $.
$d F e v $.
$d G e $.
$d R e v $.
$d T e v $.
$d V e v $.
$d e v $.
